content: this pattern is available for free on my blog but this is a great way to get the downloadable ad-free pattern **materials** yarn 100 yards each ww yarn in red white and blue or colors of choice yarns used in the sample rhss cherry white royal crochet hooks h 5mm for stars i 5 5mm supplies yarn needle for weaving in ends optional measuring tape scissors **measurements** finished measurements 11 long x 16 wide across bottom edge measured flat / 5 5 wide at neck gauge - 2 with an i hook = 6 half_double_crochet sts and 5 half_double_crochet rounds 2 5 v st clusters x 3 v st rounds ______________ email help is available with each pattern purchase please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 2 pinterest 3 instagram 4 twitter 5 please check out my other patterns ~ featured sale patterns of the week 6 ~ the rest of my shop for over 500 patterns shop now 7 join my facebook group totally snappy 8 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 9 _______________ copyright ©2021 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 2 https //www facebook com/snappytots 3 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 4 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 5 https //twitter com/snappytots 6 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 7 http //shop snappy-tots com 8 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/ 9 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com
